response.job_title: Strategy & Transactions | M&A Advisory | Due Diligence | Financial Analysis | CM&AA
response.summary:
Skilled Consultant Professional with experience in Financial Advisory and Management Consulting working as a Supervisor for PKF O'Connor Davies LLP in the NYC office. Prior to this, I was a Senior Consultant at EY, and before this, I was working as a Consultant and Auditor at KPMG in Colombia where I gained expertise in Audit and Finance.

I have a Master's degree in Finance from Hult International Business School, with nearly 8 years of experience in the areas of external audit, financial due diligence, valuations and accounting. During my career, I had the chance to assist local (Colombia) and international clients from USA, Japan, France, UK, and Mexico, among others.

I had the opportunity to gain experience in several industries such as: oil and gas, manufacturing, health, hospitality, technology, telecommunications, financial services, TCF, among others. However, I am very interested in acquiring more knowledge about innovative and sustainable companies.

I like to seek and find innovative and creative solutions to challenging problems. As a result of these challenges, my analytical skills, along with my versatility, help me anticipate problems and adapt to different situations.

Sports have marked much of my life and continue to be a very important part of my free time whether I am playing soccer or spending time at the gym.
response.skills: Leadership, Project Management, Merge & Acquisition, Business Valuation, User Exits, Management Due Diligence, Transacciones financieras, Reporting & Analysis, Business Strategy, Financial Reporting, Quality of Service (QoS), IFRS, Due Diligence, SAP ERP, Microsoft Excel, Microsoft Word, Microsoft Office, Management, Customer Service, Communication

profile_positions.description:
As a Manager, I contribute to the different work teams based on my previous experience according to the following responsibilities:

- Lead and actively participate in due diligence projects related to acquisitions for both private equity investor groups and strategic corporate buyers.
- Conduct in-depth financial and operational analyses of target companies by examining accounting records and engaging in management interviews.
- Prepare and assess pro forma financial information to project future performance.
- Identify potential issues that may impact purchase price negotiations, deal structuring, or lead to deal termination.
- Develop post-acquisition action plans to achieve projected earnings and cash flow improvements.
- Evaluate the impact of seasonality and cyclicality on cash flow requirements for target companies.
- Conduct comprehensive industry and company research to support due diligence findings and client valuations.
- Supervise and mentor Staff and Senior employees, managing their performance and expectations.
- Play an active role in staff development by conducting timely performance reviews and providing guidance and support.
- Generate business opportunities by identifying potential clients and contributing to proposals and new business endeavors. This includes drafting responses, participating in the proposal process, building client relationships, and demonstrating a deep understanding of client businesses and industry dynamics.
profile_positions.title: Manager Transaction Advisory Services

profile_positions.description:
As a Supervisor of Transaction Advisory Services, I contributed to the different work teams based on my previous experience according to the following responsibilities:

- Assist in buy-side and sell-side financial due diligence engagements from both private equity and strategic corporate buyers. 
- Analyze historical financial statements and evaluate operational trends to identify sustainable earnings for a variety of industries, including manufacturing and distribution. 
- Coordinate with team and management regarding client expectations concerning project deliverables and deadlines. 
- Effectively write and communicate engagement reports and deliverables. 
- Adhere to the highest degree of professional standards and strict client confidentiality.
profile_positions.title: Supervisor | Transaction Advisory Services

profile_positions.description:
As a Senior Consultant of Transaction and Strategy services, I advised financial investors and corporate clients on financial as well as strategic matters related to company transactions and organizational transformations across multiple industries.

Key Achievements:
- Conducted buy and sell side support on diversified engagements and preparation of financial due diligence reports.
- Performed analysis and presentation of purchase price items (e.g. adjusted EBITDA, net debt and TWC & OWC).
- Examined analysis of liquidity metrics (e.g. cash flow calculation, cash conversion, DSO, DPO, DIO).
- Executed financial key performance indicator analysis (e.g. liquidity, leverage, efficiency and profitability ratios).
- Completed analysis of Tower Cash Flow (TCF)
- Established financial carve-outs and pro-forma presentation of financials figures (e.g. pro-forma consolidation and adjustments).
profile_positions.title: Senior | Strategy and Transactions

profile_positions.description:

- Determined the net cash or debt through potential obligations or liabilities that were skipped from the financial information.
- Calculated the Key Performance Indicators and identified pros and cons of Business and Targets.
